name: PROC_INFO_SECTION_AUD
description: This table holds the procedure information navigator section audit information.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Episode.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AN_AUD_PROC_ID
columns.description: Contains audit trail information on procedure.

columns.name: AN_AUD_PROC_DATE
columns.description: Contains audit trail information on procedure date.

columns.name: AN_AUD_PROC_PRE_DX_ID
columns.description: Contains audit trail information on pre-op diagnosis.

columns.name: AN_AUD_PROC_TIME
columns.description: Contains audit trail information on procedure time.

columns.name: AN_AUD_PROC_COMMENT
columns.description: Contains audit trail information on procedure comment.

columns.name: AN_AUD_PROC_USER_ID
columns.description: Contains audit trail information on documenting user.

columns.name: AN_AUD_PROC_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: AN_AUD_PROC_EDITED_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Contains audit trail information on when procedure information was edited.
